content: Reading this made me sad like when you think about your mom dying and your eyes start to water than you remember that she will live forever and never think that way again. I am a die hard Washington fan but I watch every Cavs game I can. When the Wiz were getting 3 top 3 picks in 5 years(Wall Beal, Porter), I was a bandwagon Heat fan. Every since he realized after the 2011 finals that he was the best player alive, it has been a beautiful thing to watch.
